column4: "Hello, Yumi. How was your day today? Did you have any interesting conversations at the store? I was busy managing the store, but I did have a customer who was really excited about the local mayor elections. It seems like there's a lot of buzz around it. Have you been following the candidates? I personally don't think Satoshi Takahashi is a good choice. What do you think?"

column4: "Hi Yumi, how was your day at the store? Did anything interesting happen today? Also, have you heard about the upcoming local mayor election? I am really interested in it and have been following the candidates closely. What do you think about it? And how is our neighbor Ayumi Kimura doing? I hope everything is good with her."
